alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Fannin; Hunt; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 5:24PM CDT until November 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rockwall County in north central Texas... Western Hunt County in north central Texas... Eastern Collin County in north central Texas... Northeastern Dallas County in north central Texas... Southwestern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lucas to Sunnyvale, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Mesquite, McKinney, Richardson, Allen, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Greenville, Balch Springs, Sachse, Murphy, Royse City, Fairview, Heath, Princeton, Fate and Lucas. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 480 and 482. Interstate 30 between mile markers 58 and 100. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
